title: Phaser

fields.name: Do the Swap (x1, Charge 100%):
fields.value: Target two players, potentially including yourself. They will be swapped, causing visitors on the first to visit the second and vice versa. This does not affect Astral abilities, and does not ignore redirection immunity. If this ability would cause a player to self-attack, they will always survive.

fields.name: Total Chaos (x1, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the Top 3. Use during the Evening Phase. The town will be notified at the start of the Night that everyone was randomly swapped to a different location.

fields.name: I'm Not Here! (Passive):
fields.value: The first time you are hit by an attack that would kill you, you reflexively swap yourself with a random player. If this ability would cause a player to self-attack, they will always survive.

desc:
Post 202
*I'm here, now I'm there! Where am I?* (Role concept from Mauio's Altered Mafia)
